name: ChatALL Backup
summary: A CHATALL file is a backup file containing settings and chats from ChatALL, an app allowing users to converse concurrently with multiple Large Language Model (LLM) AI bots. It is a Zip-compressed archive that stores multiple .JSON files ( ChatALL.json and localforage.json ) containing plain text information about settings and chats in the JSON standard. ChatALL users export and import CHATALL files to share or preserve settings and messages.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
